setting.time: 22nd century, evening with alien dual-star lighting
setting.location: Observatory deck of research station above planet Solaris
setting.weather: Clear space environment with cosmic radiation filtered

characters.appearance: Man, early 30s, brown hair calmer but showing signs of deep psychological change, face gaunt from emotional trauma
characters.clothing: Clean station uniform, deliberately maintained despite inner transformation
characters.position: Standing at observation window, posture showing exhausted acceptance
characters.action: Gazing at alien ocean with new understanding, no longer trying to comprehend but simply witnessing the incomprehensible

scene.mainElements: Massive observation window showing full view of living alien ocean, plasma formations creating impossible geometric patterns, dual star system casting ethereal light
scene.details: Ocean surface showing constant movement of sentient plasma, impossible structures forming and dissolving, colors beyond normal spectrum, station reflections on window glass mixing with alien light, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Vast alien planet filling view, cosmic environment emphasizing human insignificance, distant stars and nebulae providing context of infinite universe
scene.atmosphere: Profound acceptance of mystery beyond human understanding, emotional exhaustion transforming into philosophical resignation, sense of contact with intelligence so alien it transcends comprehension

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot from behind showing character against cosmic view
composition.focus: Solitary human figure contemplating infinite alien intelligence
composition.depth: Character silhouetted in foreground, window frame in middle ground, vast alien ocean filling background with dynamic patterns

colorPalette.usageNotes: Cool tones dominate with pops of vibrant neon lighting

lineArt.texture: smooth digital, hard edges on tech

lighting.intensity: high contrast (bright neon vs deep shadow)
lighting.highlights: lens flares, neon glows on surfaces

rendering.texture: smooth with textured brushes for atmosphere
rendering.detailLevel: high in focal points (tech details), looser elsewhere

perspective: dynamic perspective (wide-angle vistas or low-angle hero shots)
